code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Expenses from'./components/Expenses';import NewExpense from'./components/NewExpense';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const initialExpenses=[{id:'e1',title:'Toilet Paper',amount:94.12,date:new Date(2020,7,14)},{id:'e2',title:'New TV',amount:799.49,date:new Date(2021,2,12)},{id:'e3',title:'Car Insurance',amount:294.67,date:new Date(2021,2,28)},{id:'e4',title:'New Desk (Wooden)',amount:450,date:new Date(2021,5,12)}];function App(){const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState(initialExpenses);const addExpenseHandler=expense=>{setExpenses(prevExpenses=>{return[expense,...prevExpenses];});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Expenses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewExpense,{onAddExpense:addExpenseHandler}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Expenses,{items:expenses})]});}export default App;
